sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM m_restaurant
WHERE market_id = :P1 /* {{1}} */

SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_GET.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */

SELECT mr.id as rest_id, mr.gen_shop_id, mr.shop_name_en as shop_name, mr.shop_logo, mr.address, mr.blank1 as geo_loc, mr.blank2 as deliv_time, mr.blank3 as deliv_charge,
 coalesce((select rwr.rest_id where rwr.rest_id is not null),0) as count_rest_wl, 
coalesce((select avg(rrr.review_value) from r_rest_review rrr where rrr.rest_id = mr.id and rrr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review
FROM m_restaurant mr 
left join r_wishlist_rest rwr on (mr.id=rwr.rest_id and rwr.user_id = @user_id) 
WHERE market_id = @market and mr.deleted_on is null ORDER BY mr.id desc LIMIT @limit

SELECT mr.id as rest_id, mr.gen_shop_id, mr.shop_name_bn as shop_name, mr.shop_logo, mr.address, mr.blank1 as geo_loc, mr.blank2 as deliv_time, mr.blank3 as deliv_charge,
 coalesce((select rwr.rest_id where rwr.rest_id is not null),0) as count_rest_wl,
